scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --all --exclude hasura run build
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach --all --exclude hasura --exclude @auto-drive/models run test
scripts.lint: yarn workspaces foreach --all --exclude hasura --exclude @auto-drive/models run lint
scripts.packages: yarn workspaces list --json | grep -E '\"name\":\"@auto-drive/[^\"]+\"'  | sed -E 's/.*\"name\":\"([^\"]+)\".*/\1/' | xargs -t -I {} yarn workspace {}
